Room.Name: Nathan Drive
Room.ShortDescription: Nathan Drive continues to the east and west.
Room.LongDescription: A large warehouse is on the north side of the road, and another building is on the other side of it. Painted on the side of the warehouse is a new sign. It says, "We make the finest rods and staves in all of the Land or Mordor. Our mages can enchant them for any purpose. Try us."
